future engineers 2015.04 retrospective

Posted by Mark Roxberry on December 4, 2015

future engineers 2015.04 retrospective

done

TOBI Project

Showed the class the TOBI Project video, imho, a great example of robotics helping, not replacing humanity through telepresence applications

batteries

Charged a few in class, loaded up a few controllers with AAs. We should be good for the short term.

make, make, make - part deux

Lots of moving robots today! Teams built their mobile bases and the robots started moving. We're moving forward, pun intended.

todo

Review the calendar, think about independent projects.

concerns

We have a few engineers as no shows 4 or so. Probably a good thing as we have limited resources and smaller team sizes are much more productive. I think the time between sessions, the overcrowding to a degree, the elective status and the time of the class (Friday afternoon) has an effect on attendance.

Tags: robotics, future engineers
